result.title: Sweat Brand
result.subtitle: About the company
result.body: Sweat Brand is the first African sport brand. It was established on 23 July 2016. The brand was founded by young, South African, entrepreneurs, with the mandate of representing atheletes from the local communities, through its innovative sports services and products. The company's mission statement is to represent athletes from a local level to the international level.
